name: Seeds Must Grow!
description:
Description

The Harvest Season is nigh, but humans are not very good at what they're trying to do. So it comes to you, The Field, to fix the error of their ways. Good for you you're able to move parts of yourself around, setting up the best environment for those in your care. As we all know, the Seeds Must Grow!

Instructions
  • Drag and drop the tiles to provide the best conditions for the appearing seeds.
  • You can't drag stones or water around.
  • Every seed has requirements listed to the right; it will grow if the requirements are filled enough.
  • Seeds' requirements are based on surrounding tiles.
  • You need to get 70% of the score to clear a level.
Controls
  • LMB (drag-and-drop): Move the tiles.
  • P: Pause.
Credits

Friends: @LionRichard @Dragonburn @Zyak Greesnoom (TBA when registered)
Music by Aleks SHAGI
